ironDOM.js

ironDOM is an JavaScript microlibrary for DOM manipulation by Raymon Schouwenaar

This is the testing page of ironDOM

Testing ironDOM

  1. if the ironDOM.addClass is loaded this is green
  2. if the ironDOM.removeClass is loaded this is green
